title: SFEC Form 125 - Bundled Contributions Disclosure Report - Filings
description:
Under San Francisco Campaign & Governmental Conduct Code Section 1.125, any committee controlled by a City elective officer or candidate for City elective office that receives contributions totaling $5,000 or more that have been bundled by a single individual shall file Form 125 at the same time that they are required to file semi-annual or pre-election campaign statements until the committee is terminated. Committees shall be required to provide this information following the receipt of the final contribution that makes the cumulative total $5,000 or more. For more information visit www.sfethics.org.

Each row on this table represents the contents of a Form 125 filed with the Ethics Commission. There are two sub-tables of information on "Officers" and "Contributions". The sub-tables are parsed into separate datasets: "SFEC Form 125 - Bundled Contributions Disclosure Report - Officers" at https://data.sfgov.org/City-Management-and-Ethics/SFEC-Form-125-Bundled-Contributions-Disclosure-Rep/x9je-gi3q and "SFEC Form 125 - Bundled Contributions Disclosure Report - Contributions" at https://data.sfgov.org/City-Management-and-Ethics/SFEC-Form-125-Bundled-Contributions-Disclosure-Rep/dzp4-4my5. Join this dataset with the sub-table using the DocuSignID.

columns.name: DocuSign ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign

columns.name: Filing URL
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing

columns.name: Filing Type
columns.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing; a Supplemental is a continuation of a filing, indicating more fields were required.

columns.name: Original Filing Date
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing

columns.name: Amendment Description
columns.description: Reason for amendment description

columns.name: Statement Period Start Date
columns.description: Start Date of Statement - In relation to campaign statement period that will reflect final payment.

columns.name: Statement Period End Date
columns.description: End Date of Statement - In relation to campaign statement period that will reflect final payment

columns.name: Bundler Name
columns.description: Name of individual who bundled contributions

columns.name: Bundler Street
columns.description: Street address of bundler

columns.name: Bundler Zip Code
columns.description: Zip code of Bundler

columns.name: Bundler City
columns.description: City of bundler

columns.name: Bundler State
columns.description: State of Bundler

columns.name: Bundler Occupation
columns.description: Occupation of bundler

columns.name: Bundler Employer
columns.description: Employer name of bundler

columns.name: FPPC ID
columns.description: Committee FPPC ID number

columns.name: Committee Name
columns.description: Committee is Filer of this form and recipient of bundled contribution

columns.name: Controlling Candidate Officer Name
columns.description: Name of controlling candidate or elective officer for committee

columns.name: Member Board Commission
columns.description: Yes or no -- is the bundler a member of a board or commission

columns.name: Board Commission Name
columns.description: Only use if bundler is a member of a City board or commission. Indicates the name of the board or commission.

columns.name: Date Signed
columns.description: Date form signed and filed by filer

columns.name: Signer Name
columns.description: Name of person who signed the form.

columns.name: Officers Sub-table Query URL
columns.description: URL to query officers reported on filing. Response is in JSON format.

columns.name: Additional Contributors Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox to indicate if a supplemental form is required because more space is needed in the contributors table on the form

columns.name: Contributors Sub-table Query URL
columns.description: URL to query contributors reported on filing. Response is in JSON format.
